author: IGN
description: Here's your look at gameplay from Deepest Fear in this new trailer for the upcoming sci-fi horror shooter game inspired by 80s retro-future cinema. The trailer showcases action-packed gameplay, horrific monsters, and the claustrophobic setting of the deep sea facility of this game. Deepest Fear will be available on PC.
title: Deepest Fear - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the new Wings of Wishes outfit from Infinity Nikki: Version 1.1 in this latest trailer for the action-adventure game. The Wings of Wishes outfit features the Paper Crane: Floating ability. Infinity Nikki's Version 1.1: Shooting Star Season runs from December 30, 2024 through January 23, 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Infinity Nikki: Version 1.1 - Official New Outfit: Wings of Wishes Trailer

author: IGN
description: Watch the launch trailer for Action Hero, a VR first-person shooter game developed by Fast Travel Games. Players will combat rabid dinosaurs, battle shotgun-wielding ninjas, and dodge devious traps to progress through the game. Fight through five movies by stepping into the role of Hero's across multiple stylish levels. Action Hero is available now for Meta Quest 2, Meta Quest 3, Meta Quest 3S, and Meta Quest Pro.
title: Action Hero - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Welcome to Lanupa. Check out this clip from Episode 5 of Star Wars: Skeleton Crew. Star Wars: Skeleton Crew stars Jude Law, Ravi Cabot-Conyers, Ryan Kiera Armstrong, Kyriana Kratter, Robert Timothy Smith, Tunde Adebimpe, Kerry Condon and Nick Frost. The full episode of Star Wars: Skeleton Crew is streaming now on Disney+.

Episodes are directed by Jon Watts, David Lowery, the Daniels (Daniel Kwan and Daniel Scheinert) Jake Schreier, Bryce Dallas Howard and Lee Isaac Chung.

Jon Watts and Christopher Ford are the head writers and also serve as executive producers along with Jon Favreau, Dave Filoni, Kathleen Kennedy and Colin Wilson. Chris Buongiorno, Karen Gilchrist and Carrie Beck are the co-executive producers, and Susan McNamara and John Bartnicki are the producers.

#IGN #StarWars
title: Star Wars: Skeleton Crew - Official Episode 5 Clip (2024) Jude Law

author: IGN
description:
Shang-Chi and Kate Bishop return in Episode 6 of What If...? Season 3. Check out the latest action-packed Marvel Animation’s What If...? Season 3 clip for the animated series. What If…? is now streaming on Disney+, with a new episode debuting daily for eight days. 

Watch as classic characters make unexpected choices that will mutate their worlds into spectacular alternate versions of the MCU. The Watcher (voice of Jeffrey Wright) will guide viewers as the series traverses new genres, bigger spectacles, and incredible new characters. The series features a voice cast that includes a host of stars who reprise their iconic roles. Season 3 features fan-favorite characters like Captain America/Sam Wilson, The Winter Soldier/Bucky Barnes, Hulk/Bruce Banner, The Red Guardian, Captain Peggy Carter, Agatha Harkness, Shang-Chi, Storm the Goddess of Thunder, and numerous others. 

Episodes are directed by Bryan Andrews and Stephan Franck and are written by Matthew Chauncey, Ryan Little, and A.C
title: Marvel Animation’s What If...? Season 3 - Official 'Mind If I Take Off My Hat First?' Clip (2024)

author: IGN
description:
Let shooting stars guide paper cranes on their journey of fulfilling dreams. Watch the latest Infinity Nikki trailer for a peek at what's coming with the Version 1.1: Shooting Star Season update, which brings new storylines, platforming challenges, time-limited events, and new outfits to ring in the new year. Infinity Nikki's Version 1.1: Shooting Star Season runs from December 30, 2024 through January 23, 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Infinity Nikki: Version 1.1 - Official Shooting Star Season Trailer

author: IGN
description:

author: IGN
description:
Indiana Jones and the Great Circle features a number of disguises for Indy to wear, allowing him to blend in while wandering through enemy territories. In this video, we'll show you where to get every disguise, including the optional ones!

0:00 - Clerical Suit
00:22 - Blackshirt Uniform
00:58 - Digsite Outfit
01:16 - Wehrmacht Uniform
02:29 - Royal Guard Uniform

#IndianaJonesAndTheGreatCircle #Disguise #Gaming
title: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle: Every Disguise Location

author: IGN
description:
With Alan Wake II and it’s DLC all released, Sam Lake sat down with IGN to talk about the state of Remedy Entertainment. 

In the interview, Sam Lake discusses the breadth of Remedy’s current production slate, including the multiple teams working on games like Firebreak, the studio's first co-op game, Control 2, and the Max Payne 1 & 2 remake.

In this Sam Lake interview, the titular game dev also talks about Remedy’s collaboration with Annapurna Pictures and how the studio is working to develop their shared universe that includes Alan Wake and Control into movies and TV shows.
title: Sam Lake on Control 2, Remedy’s Connected Universe, and the Studio’s Future

author: IGN
description:
The year 2024 has been turbulent for the gaming industry, marked by significant layoffs and closures affecting both large and small studios. Notable examples include Arkane Austin and PlayStation's London Studio, alongside job losses at Riot, Microsoft, Bungie, Unity, Take-Two Interactive, and EA. There have also been trend-chasing failures such as Firewalk Studios' "Concord" and "Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League." Additionally, there were hardware hiccups like those seen with the PlayStation 5 Pro, and Nintendo Sound Clock: Alarmo,  and box office disappointments from films like "Borderlands" and "Joker: Folie à Deux." In this video, we'll take a look back at the biggest disappointments of the year!

#Gaming #IGN #Movies
title: The Biggest Disappointments of 2024

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Alice's Wonderland Cafe Trailer for Sky: Children of the Light, a cozy multiplayer MMORPG developed by thatgamecompany. Players will be able to fall down the rabbit hole and into Alice's Wonderland Cafe. The event will also come with exclusive, wonderland-inspired cosmetics such as a beautiful yellow dress inspired by Lewis Carroll’s original story, as well as perplexing mazes and jam sessions with the Mad Hatter. The Alice's Wonderland Cafe event for Sky: Children of the Light is available now through January 12 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Nintendo Switch, iOS, Android, and PC (Steam).

#SkyChildrenOfTheLight #AlicesWonderlandCafe #Gaming
title: Sky: Children of the Light - Official Alice's Wonderland Cafe Trailer

author: IGN
description: From a presumed-dead superhero returning to life, to a Pulitzer-prize-winning rapper lyrically burying another, this year had it all. It's time we took a look back at the three biggest entertainment stories that popped off on IGN in 2024. The Marvel Cinematic Universe dropped a massive bomb at this year's San Diego Comic-Con, by revealing who will be playing the MCU's Doctor Doom. None other than Iron Man himself, Robert Downey, Jr. appeared at the Hall H conference, sparking wild speculation as to how RDJ could return to the MCU after having been given a proper send-off in Avengers: Endgame. In music news, we were witness to one of the greatest rap beefs in history, as Kendrick Lamar and Drake traded barbs over several songs during the summer. It didn't even matter who "lost," as the public was treated to banger after banger from both sides. And finally, an unauthorized Willy Wonka pop-up went viral for being a total bust. But the star of the event was a character not even in the Wo
title: The Biggest Entertainment Stories of 2024 - IGN The Fix: Entertainment

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Destination Pyro Trailer for Star Citizen, a multiplayer space trading and combat simulation game developed by Cloud Imperium. Players can explore six new vast planets and six treacherous moons in a new star system called Destination Pyro. Get a glimpse at what there is to experience with the Alpha 4.0 for Star Citizen that includes Destination Pyro alongside server meshing, contested zones, asteroid bases, and more. Star Citizen is available now for PC.

#StarCitizen #DestinationPyro #Gaming
title: Star Citizen - Official Destination Pyro Trailer
